DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies and 2 damage to yourself for every clarity bonus you have. You cannot be affected by memories or clarities for the remainder of the fight.
Starts combat Exhausted. Move from Exhaust pile to hand whenever an enemy dies.
Permanently removes this card from your deck (not just this combat).
A memory of #yEnvy, #yGreed, #yGluttony, #yLust, #yPride, #ySloth, or #yWrath.
A memory of #yCharity, #yChastity, #yDiligence, #yHumility, #yKindness, #yPatience, or #yTemperance.
Memories you have Clarity of won't be forgotten when remembering a new memory.
Increases attack damage by 1 for every 100 gold you have.
When you remember Chastity, gain #b2 #yDexterity. At the end of each turn, lose #b1 #yDexterity and gain #b6 #yBlock.
When you remember Diligence, draw #b2 cards. At the end of your turn, retain #b1.
When you remember Envy, gain #b1 #yVulnerable. Whenever you target an enemy with a card, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to that enemy.
Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, gain #b10 gold.
Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by #b3.
Gain #b2 #yThorns.
When you remember Kindness, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies. Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b1 #yPoison.
Your attacks deal 25% bonus damage. When you forget Lust, gain 2 Weak.
Gain 1 Coil each time you play a card. When you remember a new memory, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies for each Coil and lose all Coil.
At the end of combat, permanently #yUpgrade a card in your deck.
When you remember Sloth, discard #b3 random cards. Draw #b1 fewer cards each turn.
Reduce #yStrength of ALL enemies by #b3.
Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, permanently increase the damage of the last damage-dealing attack card played this combat by 1.
Burning creatures lose HP at the start of their turn and have healing reduced by 50%. Each turn, Burning is reduced by half.
